00122 /*---- MSCB commands -----------------------------------------------*/
00123 
00124 #define MCMD_ADDR_NODE8  0x09
00125 #define MCMD_ADDR_NODE16 0x0A
00126 #define MCMD_ADDR_BC     0x10
00127 #define MCMD_ADDR_GRP8   0x11
00128 #define MCMD_ADDR_GRP16  0x12
00129 #define MCMD_PING8       0x19
00130 #define MCMD_PING16      0x1A
00131 
00132 #define MCMD_INIT        0x20
00133 #define MCMD_GET_INFO    0x28
00134 #define MCMD_SET_ADDR    0x34
00135 #define MCMD_SET_BAUD    0x39
00136 
00137 #define MCMD_FREEZE      0x41
00138 #define MCMD_SYNC        0x49
00139 #define MCMD_UPGRADE     0x50
00140 #define MCMD_USER        0x58
00141 
00142 #define MCMD_ECHO        0x61
00143 #define MCMD_TOKEN       0x68
00144 #define MCMD_SET_FLAGS   0x69
00145 
00146 #define MCMD_ACK         0x78
00147 
00148 #define MCMD_WRITE_NA    0x80
00149 #define MCMD_WRITE_ACK   0x88
00150 
00151 #define MCMD_FLASH       0x98
00152 
00153 #define MCMD_READ        0xA0
00154 
00155 #define MCMD_WRITE_BLOCK 0xB5
00156 #define MCMD_READ_BLOCK  0xB9
00157 
00158 #define GET_INFO_GENERAL   0
00159 #define GET_INFO_VARIABLE  1
00160 
00161 /*---- flags from the configuration and status register (CSR) ------*/
00162 
00163 #define CSR_DEBUG       (1<<0)
00164 #define CSR_LCD_PRESENT (1<<1)
00165 #define CSR_SYNC_MODE   (1<<2)
00166 #define CSR_FREEZE_MODE (1<<3)
00167 #define CSR_WD_RESET    (1<<2)
00168 
00169 /*---- baud rates used ---------------------------------------------*/
00170 
00171 #define BD_9600            1
00172 #define BD_19200           2
00173 #define BD_28800           3
00174 #define BD_57600           4
00175 #define BD_115200          5
00176 #define BD_172800          6
00177 #define BD_345600          7
00178 
00179 /*---- info structures ---------------------------------------------*/
00180 
00181 typedef struct {
00182    unsigned char protocol_version;
00183    unsigned char n_variables;
00184    unsigned short node_address;
00185    unsigned short group_address;
00186    unsigned short watchdog_resets;
00187    char node_name[16];
00188 } MSCB_INFO;
00189 
00190 typedef struct {
00191    unsigned char width;         // width in bytes
00192    unsigned char unit;          // physical units UNIT_xxxx
00193    unsigned char prefix;        // unit prefix PRFX_xxx
00194    unsigned char status;        // status (not yet used)
00195    unsigned char flags;         // flags MSCBF_xxx
00196    char name[8];                // name
00197 } MSCB_INFO_VAR;
00198 
00199 #define MSCBF_FLOAT  (1<<0)     // variable in floating point format
00200 #define MSCBF_SIGNED (1<<1)     // variable is signed integer
00201 
00202 /* physical units */
00203 
00204 #define PRFX_PICO       -12
00205 #define PRFX_NANO        -9
00206 #define PRFX_MICRO       -6
00207 #define PRFX_MILLI       -3
00208 #define PRFX_NONE         0
00209 #define PRFX_KILO         3
00210 #define PRFX_MEGA         6
00211 #define PRFX_GIGA         9
00212 #define PRFX_TERA        12
00213 
00214 #define UNIT_UNDEFINED    0
00215 
00216 // SI base units
00217 #define UNIT_METER        1
00218 #define UNIT_GRAM         2
00219 #define UNIT_SECOND       3
00220 #define UNIT_MINUTE       4
00221 #define UNIT_HOUR         5
00222 #define UNIT_AMPERE       6
00223 #define UNIT_KELVIN       7
00224 #define UNIT_CELSIUS      8
00225 #define UNIT_FARENHEIT    9
00226 
00227 // SI derived units
00228 
00229 #define UNIT_HERTZ       20
00230 #define UNIT_PASCAL      21
00231 #define UNIT_BAR         22
00232 #define UNIT_WATT        23
00233 #define UNIT_VOLT        24
00234 #define UNIT_OHM         25
00235 #define UNIT_TESLA       26
00236 #define UNIT_LITERPERSEC 27
00237 #define UNIT_RPM         28
00238 #define UNIT_FARAD       29
00239 
00240 // computer units
00241 
00242 #define UNIT_BOOLEAN     50
00243 #define UNIT_BYTE        52
00244 #define UNIT_WORD        53
00245 #define UNIT_DWORD       54
00246 #define UNIT_ASCII       55
00247 #define UNIT_STRING      56
00248 #define UNIT_BAUD        57
00249 
00250 // others
00251 
00252 #define UNIT_PERCENT     90
00253 #define UNIT_PPM         91
00254 #define UNIT_COUNT       92
00255 #define UNIT_FACTOR      93

00258 /*---- file descriptor ---------------------------------------------*/
00259 
00260 #define MSCB_MAX_FD      10
00261 
00262 #define MSCB_TYPE_LPT     1
00263 #define MSCB_TYPE_USB     2
00264 #define MSCB_TYPE_COM     3
00265 #define MSCB_TYPE_RPC     4
00266 
00267 typedef struct {
00268    char device[256];
00269    int type;
00270    int fd;
00271    int remote_fd;
00272    int hr, hw;
00273 } MSCB_FD;
00274 
00275 extern MSCB_FD mscb_fd[MSCB_MAX_FD];
00276 
00277 /*---- status codes ------------------------------------------------*/
00278 
00279 #define MSCB_SUCCESS       1
00280 #define MSCB_CRC_ERROR     2
00281 #define MSCB_TIMEOUT       3
00282 #define MSCB_INVAL_PARAM   4
00283 #define MSCB_MUTEX         5
00284 #define MSCB_FORMAT_ERROR  6
00285 #define MSCB_NO_MEM        7
00286 #define MSCB_SUBM_ERROR    8
00287 #define MSCB_ADDR_EXISTS   9
00288 
00289 /*---- Byte and Word swapping big endian <-> little endian ---------*/
00290 #define WORD_SWAP(x) { unsigned char _tmp;                               \
00291                        _tmp= *((unsigned char *)(x));                    \
00292                        *((unsigned char *)(x)) = *(((unsigned char *)(x))+1);     \
00293                        *(((unsigned char *)(x))+1) = _tmp; }
00294 
00295 #define DWORD_SWAP(x) { unsigned char _tmp;                              \
00296                        _tmp= *((unsigned char *)(x));                    \
00297                        *((unsigned char *)(x)) = *(((unsigned char *)(x))+3);     \
00298                        *(((unsigned char *)(x))+3) = _tmp;               \
00299                        _tmp= *(((unsigned char *)(x))+1);                \
00300                        *(((unsigned char *)(x))+1) = *(((unsigned char *)(x))+2); \
00301                        *(((unsigned char *)(x))+2) = _tmp; }
00302

00310 /* make functions under WinNT dll exportable */
00311 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && defined(_USRDLL)
00312 #define EXPRT __declspec(dllexport)
00313 #else
00314 #define EXPRT
00315 #endif
00316 
00317    int EXPRT mscb_init(char *device, int size, int debug);

00322    int EXPRT mscb_exit(int fd);

00326    int EXPRT mscb_echo(int fd, int addr, unsigned char d1, unsigned char *d2);
00327    int EXPRT mscb_info(int fd, int adr, MSCB_INFO * info);

00333    int EXPRT mscb_write_block(int fd, int adr, unsigned char index, void *data, int size);
00334    int EXPRT mscb_flash(int fd, int adr);

00338                              unsigned char index2, void *data, int *size);
